content.theme: You are the wall. Nothing gets through. Nothing gets past.
content.design: Fortress augments make you harder to kill and protect your allies.

augments.name: Shock Absorbers
augments.effect: Reduce first damage taken each round by 1

augments.name: Immovable Frame
augments.effect: Cannot be forcibly moved. +2 to resist knockdown

augments.name: Reactive Plating
augments.effect: When hit by melee, attacker takes 1 damage

augments.name: Ablative Shielding
augments.effect: +2 Armor against the first attack each combat

augments.name: Taunt Emitter
augments.effect: 1/round: force one enemy to target you instead of ally

augments.name: Fortress Wall
augments.effect: Opportunity attacks deal +2 damage per die

augments.name: Kinetic Dispersal
augments.effect: Reduce all area-of-effect damage taken by half (rounded down)

augments.name: Anchored Defense
augments.effect: While you don't move this turn: allies directly behind you gain half cover (+2 Evasion)

augments.name: Last Stand
augments.effect: 1/mission: when you would hit 0 HP, stay at 1 HP instead

augments.name: Fortress Aura
augments.effect: Allies within short range: +1 Armor and +1 Evasion

augments.name: Siege Mode
augments.effect: Spend 5 AP: +4 Armor, cannot move, cannot be flanked

augments.name: Unbreakable
augments.effect: Maximum Scar count increased by 2. While at 3+ Scars: immune to death saves. Still take Scars normally.
